name: Tesla Cybertruck Interactive Showcase
description:
"Tesla Cybertruck Interactive Showcase" is an interactive showcase of the Telsa Cybertruck car with a cyberpunk theme and aesthetic.

The showcase begins with an initial cinematic with the logo of Tesla and the developer company, then the car appears in a frantic pursuit of a missile, which manages to hit the Cybertruck, after the explosion it is possible to better appreciate the car without any damage, highlighting its resistance.

Next, you can freely interact with the most important components of the Cybertruck, such as the wheels, interior, battery, trunk, engine, among others.

When interacting with a component there will be a guided kinematics emphasizing that component and displaying a panel with information about that component.
